title: The preventive effects of native probiotic and postbiotic on inflammation and oxidative stress in DSS-induced colitis with normal diet: Which of these agents may offer greater advantages?
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Niloofar Rezaie, Shadi Aghamohammad, Elham Haj Agha Gholizadeh Khiavi, Shohreh Khatami, Aria Sohrabi, Mahdi Rohani
